alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 23 at 2:25AM PST until December 23 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 5 to 20 below zero. Wind speeds 5 to 10 mph with localized gusts 15 to 20 mph. * WHERE...Bridgeport, Okanogan, Nespelem, Tonasket, Brewster, Disautel Pass, Oroville, and Omak. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
